title: Tech groups ask Justice Alito to stay Texas social media law - POLITICO
content:
1. Tech groups ask Justice Alito to stay Texas social media law  POLITICO
  2. Tech industry appeals the bad Texas social media law to the Supreme Court  The Verge
  3. Tech groups ask Supreme Court to put Texas social media censorship law on hold  CNN
  4. Tech groups ask Supreme Court to block Texas social media law  The Washington Post
  5. Tech groups ask Supreme Court to block Texas' social media law  Axios
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Alito has the option to issue an emergency stay unilaterally, or to refer the matter to the full court.
